name: Elasticsearch
description:
IntelliJ Elasticsearch plugin allows you to connect to Elasticsearch or Kibana, browse and edit your data and perform REST API requests.

Features:

  • Connect to Elasticsearch or Kibana using SSH, SSL or AWS Signature
  • Browse data in Table or JSON view with filtering, sorting and pagination
  • Save your requests to Favorites or keep them in project or scratch files
  • Query DSL and REST API autocomplete
  • Create, Update or Delete documents in table or in JSON editor
  • Search using Kibana Query Language with fields autocomplete
  • Elasticsearch documentation for REST API and Query DSL
  • List of clusters, indices, aliases and nodes with short information
  • Export documents to CSV, JSON or Dump files
  • Copy indices or Import from CSV, JSON or Dump files
  • Support all Elasticsearch and OpenSearch versions
  • Much more!

Documentation

To get more information about plugin features and usage, please visit the Documentation.
